attributes.action: Pay the Armed Forces Minimum Wage
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Whilst on Operations, Military members are on duty 24 hours a day.  Often getting mortared whilst in barracks (ie. Iraq, Afghanistan).  The soldiers, Seamen and Airmen get their basic pay based on an 8 hour day.  Based on a 24 hour per day pay scale, in the RAF only Sqn Ldr's (Senior Management) and above are paid UK minimum wage at roughly £44,000+ per annum.  I suggest that at least whilst on an operational tour of 2 to 6 months that ALL members of the Armed Forces be paid 24 hours per day at Minimum Wage rates £5.05 per hour.
